animeTitle: Kindaichi Shounen no Jikenbo: Shinigami Byouin Satsujin Jiken
animeDescription: A one-hour special that aired after a month of the series' absence on television between episodes 23 and 24.  Kindaichi will have to investigate in a hospital where series of murder happen.
